location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, states that he has taken the opportunity of forwarding the Bussora [Basra] and Bagdad [Baghdad] packets from the Ternateto Samuel Manesty via the American ship, the Two Sons. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun gives details of the whereabouts of the Persian King [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar] and encloses a duplicate (not included) of a communication that has been sent to Manesty overland.
